video.title: Case Closed
video.synopsis: Turned into a young boy by a sinister potion, teen sleuth Conan helps solve baffling crimes while tracking down the nefarious agents who poisoned him.

episodes.synopsis: While visiting a school friend at his cousin's home, the Detective Boys find a dead man next door. Sato makes a shocking revelation to Takagi.
episodes.title: Metropolitan Police Detective Love Story: Confessions

episodes.synopsis: As Conan, Detective Takagi and Detective Sato work to solve the murder, Conan struggles to find evidence linking the killer to the time of death.
episodes.title: Metropolitan Police Detective Love Story: The Truth

episodes.synopsis: Conan and the Detective Boys are at the beach when their new friend Kotaru begins drowning in the ocean, leading Conan to suspect something.
episodes.title: The Man Who Was Betrayed by the Sea

episodes.synopsis: When a local news article features a stray cat named Captain, three different people claim Captain belongs to them. Who is telling the truth?
episodes.title: The Case of the Lucky Calico: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: After discovering that Captain's true owner is Teishi Masuko, Conan finds Teishi injured and barely breathing in his apartment and suspects foul play.
episodes.title: The Case of the Lucky Calico: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: While Ran is visiting an older school friend who shares a house with several others, one of the roommates is found murdered in her bedroom.
episodes.title: The Blind Spot in the Share House

episodes.synopsis: Conan and his friends attend a gathering where they learn about the strange Red Woman murder case, and soon they have their own murder to unravel.
episodes.title: The Tragedy of the Red Woman: Steam

episodes.synopsis: While the young detectives help the police investigate Hakuya's murder, a power outage occurs and Sumika is attacked by the red-haired woman.
episodes.title: Tragedy of the Red Woman: Evil Spirit

episodes.synopsis: After Uehara tends to Sumika's injuries, Uehara and Yui provide some information to Conan and Masami that lead them to pinpoint the murderer.
episodes.title: Tragedy of the Red Woman: Revenge

episodes.synopsis: A comedian known as DoDonPa takes the blame for the murder of his talent agency's president, Tendo Hideki, but preliminary clues absolve him of guilt.
episodes.title: The Comedian Who Turned Himself In: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Conan feels something is wrong with DoDonPa's all-too-convenient alibi and begins to strongly suspect he's guilty of Tendou's murder after all.
episodes.title: The Comedian Who Turned Himself In: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: While Conan, Ran and Sonoko visit Sera at her hotel, the assistant to an author who's working on manuscripts meets a certain fate.
episodes.title: The Romance Novel with the Unexpected Conclusion: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: While Hiura has the perfect alibi for his assistant Minazuki's murder, Conan and Sera are suspicious, especially after they search Minazuki's room.
episodes.title: The Romance Novel with the Unexpected Conclusion: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Conan, Kogoro and Ran go to Ishikawa Prefecture's Kanazawa, where Kogoro is to help with the Kaga Hyakumangoku Mystery Tour city revitalization event.
episodes.title: Kaga Hyakumangoku Mystery Tour: Kanazawa Arc

episodes.synopsis: Ran goes to the hospital with Akiyama after she is bludgeoned. Later, Conan examines the four cards that fell out of Akiyama's bag during the attack.
episodes.title: Kaga Hyakumangoku Mystery Tour: Kaga Hot Springs Part

episodes.synopsis: A run-in with a drug dealer fleeing the police leaves Conan with the man's notebook, which contains a code that uses subway station and line numbers.
episodes.title: Conan and Heiji's Code of Love: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: At the scene of the drug deal, Heiji sees three people wearing or holding white roses and sends Conan pictures of them with his cell phone.
episodes.title: Conan and Heiji's Code of Love: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Conan, Genta and Mitsuhiko are enjoying a kite-flying contest when opposing team member Renno falls into the river. But was it really an accident?
episodes.title: Teimuzu River Kite Flying Case: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: When it appears that Renno's fall into the river was not an accident, Conan pinpoints three individuals who had possible motives to harm him.
episodes.title: Teimuzu River Kite Flying Case:  Part 2

episodes.synopsis: While Conan, Agasa and the kids are visiting a boarding house managed by sisters Ryoko, Aya and Juri, Conan happens upon a heated argument.
episodes.title: The Lover Gone Missing in a Snowstorm

episodes.synopsis: Conan and his friends search for the missing Ai, who turns out to be bound and gagged inside a home along with her neighbor Mitsuru.
episodes.title: Haibara Ai Imprisonment Case

episodes.synopsis: Conan and his companions are walking home from school when a wounded man being chased by the police grabs Ayumi as a hostage, but then faints.
episodes.title: The Troublesome Emergency Patient

episodes.synopsis: Four people are having a tea party in a patient's room at Haido Central Hospital when one of them falls over dead, poisoned by cyanide in her cup.
episodes.title: The Tense Tea Party: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The police fail to find the container used to hold the poison that killed Reina and proceed to question the three people who were with her.
episodes.title: The Tense Tea Party: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: The detectives go to meet professor Agasa at Beika Aquarium, where Conan, as Shinichi, once had a date with Ran and they witnessed a stabbing.
episodes.title: Kudo Shinichi Aquarium Case: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Ran recalls that after the stabbing at the aquarium, Shinichi and Inspector Megure questioned three people Shumoto had communicated with on his phone.
episodes.title: Kudo Shinichi Aquarium Case: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Munch's painting "The Scream" is being shipped to an exhibition at the Suzuki Museum. Conan must investigate when the delivery truck goes off course.
episodes.title: Munch's Missing Scream

episodes.synopsis: Kogoro goes undercover to infiltrate a gang of thieves, but the gang boss discovers his real identity and forces Kogoro to work for him.
episodes.title: The Manipulated Great Detective: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Conan is captured while trying to rescue Kogoro, and the two must quickly solve the murder of Mr. Head's son to prevent an assassin from killing Ran.
episodes.title: The Manipulated Great Detective: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Conan, Ayumi, Genta and Mitsuhiko meet a group of elderly detectives, and soon they're all involved in solving the murder of a young man.
episodes.title: The Detective Boys vs the Silver Detectives

episodes.synopsis: The wife of the missing painter Aoki hires Kogoro to find him. Conan determines from one of Aoki's paintings that he is in Tokugawa Prefecture's Uozo.
episodes.title: Mirage of the Disappearing Angel

episodes.synopsis: Schoolteacher Natsuko is on her way to an appointment when someone pushes her down a flight of stairs. Conan and Jodie investigate.
episodes.title: The Scarlet Prologue

episodes.synopsis: Following the attack on Natsuko, Conan and his companions question three people, and Conan notices something strange while listening to their stories.
episodes.title: The Scarlet Pursuit

episodes.synopsis: Conan is frustrated by being duped, and Amuro receives some information that leads him to believe FBI agent Akai Shuichi may not be dead after all.
episodes.title: The Scarlet Intersection

episodes.synopsis: Armed with his theory that Akai switched his own body with Kusuda's and may still be alive, Amuro visits Okiya and explains Akai's trick step by step.
episodes.title: The Scarlet Return

episodes.synopsis: Akai fires at the secret police's vehicles and immobilizes them. Later, Akai gives Amuro's colleagues the gun that Kusuda used to shoot himself.
episodes.title: The Scarlet Truth

episodes.synopsis: Sonoko, Ran and Conan are called to a high school by student Eimi and her Club Orihime friends, who have received what seem like threatening letters.
episodes.title: Welcome to Club Orihime

episodes.synopsis: Conan searches for the culprit responsible for a threatening letter sent to Haneda Shukichi before he's to compete in a meijin title match.
episodes.title: Taiko Meijin's Match of Love: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The threatening letter Shukichi received came from a man called the Headless Shogi Player, who claims to have kidnapped Shukichi's girlfriend, Yumi.
episodes.title: Taiko Meijin's Match of Love: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Conan and his friends investigate when the daughter of a company president drowns while searching a hotel pool for her lost necklace.
episodes.title: The Mystery Sinking in the Midsummer Pool: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: After Megure questions three acquaintances of Nagami, suspecting one of them had a motive to murder her, Conan and Sera investigate the pool.
episodes.title: The Mystery Sinking in the Midsummer Pool: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: When weather forecaster Yasumi suffers a fatal fall, Conan notices clues that make him think her fall may not have been an accident.
episodes.title: The Queen's Weather Forecast

episodes.synopsis: After Kanzaki receives death threats, a man in a ski mask stabs a Beikado employee Shimomura, who was wearing the Bekapon costume in Kanzaki's place.
episodes.title: Bekapon's Bleeding Service

episodes.synopsis: Conan and his friends are having dinner at a restaurant when they witness a waiter punching a co-worker before attempting to flee.
episodes.title: Detective Takagi on the Run in Handcuffs

episodes.synopsis: A boy tells Conan and his friends that a woman living nearby asked him to call the police if she doesn't exit her apartment after three visitors come.
episodes.title: Three First Discoverers: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Conan and Megure investigate when a scriptwriter is found hanged in her apartment, and clues lead them to a murder and theft case three years prior.
episodes.title: Three First Discoverers: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Actress Haneki Ryo feels she is in danger, so Kogoro is hired to protect Ryo as her bodyguard and determine who is trying to kill her.
episodes.title: Bodyguard Mori Kogoro!

episodes.synopsis: On her way home from school, Ayumi spies a man carrying the unconscious body of his wife to his car, and she fears the woman may have been murdered.
episodes.title: The Secret of the Missing Young Lady

episodes.synopsis: When a writer falls to his death from a building's fifth floor and Conan questions the man's wife and the security guard, the mystery only deepens.
episodes.title: The Lovebirds' Ruse

episodes.synopsis: Conan tries to help college student Funako find missing job-hopper Hikone, but has trouble getting any helpful information from Hikone's neighbors.
episodes.title: The Dreaming Girl's Confused Deduction

episodes.synopsis: When an office worker falls from the roof of a building and almost crushes a pedestrian below, Conan suspects that someone meant to kill them both.
episodes.title: The Moving Target

episodes.synopsis: Conan and his friends head to the lot of a demolished mansion to practice soccer, only to find police investigating a body found in the lot's pool.
episodes.title: The Detective Boys' Locked Room Mystery Battle
